lines.text: Save your wind, save your wind, you might want to go sailing sometime.
[to prison official during release from prison]
This is a very nice institution you have here Miss Muncie, but you do cater to a rather low class.
Is it a good job?
Bed of roses.
Oughta smell good.
Minnie!
[spotting Minnie's wedding ring]
I had to give in sometime, you see the hips was gettin' away from me. You know, I can't stand obesity.
You can't stand what?
Let it go.
How good are you at walkin' on water?
Oh, just fair, but I could do a lot of thinkin' on gin if I knew where to get some.
[Minnie enters room and spots liquor bottle not knowing that it's empty]
Ah, there you are sweetheart.
[to liquor bottle]
Say, if you want any more you'll have to wring it out of him to get it.
[motions to her drunk companion]
He looks wrung out now... why didn't he eat the bottle?
Can you imagine her drowning like that? And in water too.
Your conversation's more interesting when you keep your mouth shut.
Oh, I got another treat for ya.
What is it?

[Dan slowly closes the door, puts a bowl on the table, pours water in it, takes a hand towel and displays both sides like a magician before tucking it in as a bib, picks up his shaving supplies and starts lathering his face]
Say... what is this treat?
I'm gonna let you watch me shave.
You're too good to me.
Any woman who can get me to shave more than twice a week must have something.
[explaining why she played the phonograph loudly during Lorry and Stephen's argument in the next room]
I was just trying to drown out your domestic happiness.
You don't look so bad yourself for a corpse.
A corpse!
You were supposed to be drown and you don't even look damp.
Well, I got myself resurrected.
Well, you done a good job while you was at it.
[looking around at Lorry's opulent apartment]
Does he own the mint?
No, but he's got an option on it.
You ever try eatin' your cake, and havin' it too.
[pause]
It's an old Swedish custom.
Hold this. I gotta go find a pirate.
How come I rate all this attention?
You're gonna have a good time tonight if I have to bust out in a rash.
